title: A scheme and abstract of the Christian religion comprized in fifty two heads, with the texts of scripture, on which they are grounded : and some short indications, how they were more largely handled / by a lover of truth and peace.
author: Steele, Richard, 1629-1692.
publisher: Printed by J.P. for Samuel Sprint ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
